pkgmetadata.longdescription: # kraken-wrapperThis projects implements `krakenw`, the wrapper CLI for the Kraken build system that enables reproducible buildsvia lock files and executing builds from inside subdirectories.For more information, check out the [Kraken Documentation](https://kraken-build.github.io/docs/).__Installation__You need Python 3.7 or newer: $ pipx install kraken-wrapper
